roleset.name: an upward blow to opponent's chin
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls.

example.name: both args
example.text: Metta World Peace Suspended 1 Game for His Uppercut to Brandon Knight.

example.name: ArgMs
example.text: If I remember correctly he won 19 out of his first 20 professional fights by first round knock out , generally consummated by a left - upper - cut struck on the jaw that would lift a 220 - pound man two feet off the mat .
example.arg: that would lft a 220 - pound man two feet off the mat
